content.raw:
8510348

Added detection for whether ArduCopter is online or not. If ArduCopter is detected (receive of fdm packet from someone), then socket receive wait time is increased from 1ms to 1 sec to accomodate network instability. If ArduCopter is not detected, receive call blocks for 1ms on each call.
Once ArduCopter presence is detected, it takes 15 (configurable) missed receives before declaring the FCS offline.
content.html:
8510348

Added detection for whether ArduCopter is online or not. If ArduCopter is detected (receive of fdm packet from someone), then socket receive wait time is increased from 1ms to 1 sec to accomodate network instability. If ArduCopter is not detected, receive call blocks for 1ms on each call. Once ArduCopter presence is detected, it takes 15 (configurable) missed receives before declaring the FCS offline.
